com.psddev.cms.db

Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      • com.psddev.cms.db.Site
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable, com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlObject, BeanInfo, Cloneable, Comparable<com.psddev.dari.db.Record>

    @ToolUi.IconName(value="object-site")
public class Site
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Record
    Group of pages that's regarded as one entity.
